meanings.definition: A large antelope native to South Africa with distinctive white markings on its face.
meanings.sent1: The blesbuck gracefully roamed the savannah.
meanings.sent2: I saw a blesbuck at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The blesbuck decided to wear sunglasses to match its white markings.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as striking as the white markings on a blesbuck's face.
meanings.sent5: The blesbuck's white markings made it easy to spot in the tall grass.

meanings.definition: To bless or give good fortune to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: May the stars blesbuck you with happiness.
meanings.sent2: The priest will blesbuck the newlyweds during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: She decided to blesbuck her new car by giving it a name.
meanings.sent4: The kind words from her friend blesbucked her heart.
meanings.sent5: The lucky charm seemed to blesbuck everything it touched.
